abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: A forceful shield strike intended to stagger or push an enemy backward.

abilities.name: Whirlwind Strike
abilities.description: Spin with controlled ferocity, striking all enemies within reach.

abilities.name: Taunting Roar
abilities.description: A booming battle cry that challenges enemies and forces them to focus their attacks on you.

abilities.name: Crushing Leap
abilities.description: Leap high and crash down on a target, attempting to stagger or pin them.

abilities.name: Seismic Shockwave
abilities.description: You slam the ground with overwhelming power, sending a shockwave that ripples through the encounter and knocks enemies off balance.

abilities.name: Momentum Monster
abilities.description: Whenever you succeed on a physical check, your next physical roll gains +3.

abilities.name: Hammer of Echoing Thunder
abilities.description: Your strikes emit thunderous echoes that may stun enemies or rattle the surrounding environment.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: A precise, deadly strike aimed at a vulnerable point, dealing enhanced damage when unnoticed.

abilities.name: Shadowstep
abilities.description: Slip momentarily into shadow, reappearing behind or beside a target.

abilities.name: Caltrop Toss
abilities.description: Scatter razor-sharp caltrops to hinder enemy movement and reduce agility.

abilities.name: Distraction Gambit
abilities.description: Use misdirection or charm to create an opening, forcing enemy hesitation.

abilities.name: Shadow Carnival
abilities.description: A flurry of illusory clones erupts around you, confusing enemies. On success, the phantoms strike in tandem; on failure, they misfire unpredictably.

abilities.name: Always One Step Ahead
abilities.description: The first attack made against you each encounter automatically misses due to uncanny reflexes.

abilities.name: Shadowglass Dagger
abilities.description: A void-forged blade that absorbs surrounding light and leaves ghostly afterimages with each strike.

abilities.name: Twin Arrows
abilities.description: Loose two arrows at once toward one or two targets.

abilities.name: Hunter’s Focus
abilities.description: Sharpen your senses, increasing accuracy and insight for your next action.

abilities.name: Snare Trap
abilities.description: Deploy a hidden snare that immobilizes the next enemy to step into it.

abilities.name: Hawkeye Shot
abilities.description: Aim with extraordinary precision, striking weak points at long range.

abilities.name: Arrowstorm Cyclone
abilities.description: Leap and spin in a controlled arc, unleashing a swirling barrage of arrows that ricochet around the environment.

abilities.name: Hunter’s Flow State
abilities.description: Success on AGI or INS checks grants a free follow-up attack without consuming a turn.

abilities.name: Stormfeather Quiver
abilities.description: Infuses each arrow with a streak of wind or lightning, allowing slight trajectory bending and improved mobility.

abilities.name: Firebolt
abilities.description: Hurl a bolt of flame at a target, searing them with magical fire.

abilities.name: Arcane Shield
abilities.description: Conjure a shimmering barrier of arcane energy to protect yourself or an ally.

abilities.name: Frostbind
abilities.description: Encase a target’s limbs in frost, slowing their movement.

abilities.name: Spectral Hand
abilities.description: A floating ghostly hand manipulates objects from afar.

abilities.name: Arcane Cataclysm
abilities.description: A miniature supernova implodes then explodes outward, bending gravity and throwing enemies off balance.

abilities.name: Mana Echo
abilities.description: Once per encounter, your first spell is cast in an empowered form without consuming additional effort.

abilities.name: Chrono-Scribed Gloves
abilities.description: You may rewind your last roll once per encounter, altering fate itself.

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: A wildly unstable bolt of energy that takes on a random elemental form.

abilities.name: Draconic Shout
abilities.description: Release a draconic roar that rattles foes and can weaken their resolve.

abilities.name: Wild Surge
abilities.description: Release unpredictable magic; results range from powerful bursts to unintended transformations.

abilities.name: Enchant Mind
abilities.description: Manipulate a weak-willed mind, influencing its next decision.

abilities.name: Prismatic Overload
abilities.description: Unleash chaotic magic in a blinding spectrum; effects vary dramatically depending on your roll.

abilities.name: Chaotic Lottery
abilities.description: At the start of each turn, gain a random +2 bonus to any stat.

abilities.name: Draconic Soul Lantern
abilities.description: Channel draconic essence to unleash a devastating cone of elemental energy once per encounter.

abilities.name: Radiant Strike
abilities.description: A holy-infused melee strike that burns with radiant energy.

abilities.name: Healing Word
abilities.description: Speak a brief divine incantation that restores an ally’s vitality.

abilities.name: Divine Barrier
abilities.description: A shimmering shield of faith protects a target from harm.

abilities.name: Sanctify
abilities.description: Consecrate an area, weakening undead or corrupt enemies.

abilities.name: Celestial Descent
abilities.description: A radiant avatar descends to mirror your movements; your next action is duplicated with divine force.

abilities.name: Blessing Overflow
abilities.description: Whenever you heal or bless an ally, you gain a small random buff yourself.

abilities.name: Halo of Dawnbreaker
abilities.description: When you would fall, you explode in healing light and rise again with renewed strength.
